sentences.zh: 太史公曰：匈奴絕和親，攻當路塞；

translations.literal: The Grand Historian said: The Xiongnu broke the peace alliance and attacked the border passes along the route;
translations.idiomatic: The Grand Historian said: The Xiongnu broke the peace alliance and attacked the border passes along the route; (translated).

translations.literal: Minyue arbitrarily invaded, Dong'ou requested surrender.
translations.idiomatic: Minyue arbitrarily invaded, Dong'ou requested surrender. (translated).

sentences.zh: 二夷交侵，當盛漢之隆，以此知功臣受封侔於祖考矣。

translations.literal: Two barbarian tribes mutually invaded at a time when Han was at its most flourishing. From this we know that meritorious ministers received enfeoffments comparable to their ancestors. (translated).
translations.idiomatic: Two barbarian tribes mutually invaded during the height of Han prosperity. From this we know that meritorious ministers received enfeoffments comparable to their ancestors.

translations.literal: Why is this?
translations.idiomatic: Why is this? (translated).

sentences.zh: 自詩書稱三代「戎狄是膺，荊荼是徵」，太史公曰：齊桓越燕伐山戎，武靈王以區區趙服單于，秦繆用百里霸西戎，吳楚之君以諸侯役百越。

translations.literal: Since the Poetry and Documents speak of the Three Dynasties 'repelling the Rong and Di, punishing Jing and Chu', the Grand Historian said: Duke Huan of Qi crossed Yan to attack the Shanrong; King Wuling with his small state of Zhao subdued the Chanyu; Duke Mu of Qin used Baili Xi to hegemonize the Western Rong; the rulers of Wu and Chu used the feudal lords to make the Hundred Yue submit.
translations.idiomatic: Since the Poetry and Documents speak of the Three Dynasties 'repelling the Rong and Di, punishing Jing and Chu', the Grand Historian said: Duke Huan of Qi crossed Yan to attack the Shanrong; King Wuling with his small state of Zhao subdued the Chanyu; Duke Mu of Qin used Baili Xi to hegemonize the Western Rong; the rulers of Wu and Chu used the feudal lords to make the Hundred Yue submit. (translated).

sentences.zh: 況乃以中國一統，明天子在上，兼文武，席卷四海，內輯億萬之眾，豈以晏然不為邊境征伐哉！

translations.literal: How much more so with China unified, the enlightened Son of Heaven above, combining civil and military, sweeping across the four seas, internally gathering crowds of millions—how could they peacefully not conduct border campaigns!
translations.idiomatic: How much more so with China unified, the enlightened Son of Heaven above, combining civil and military, sweeping across the four seas, internally gathering crowds of millions—how could they peacefully not conduct border campaigns! (translated).

sentences.zh: 自是後，遂出師北討彊胡，南誅勁越，將卒以次封矣。

translations.literal: From this time afterward, they sent out armies to attack the strong Hu to the north, executed the strong Yue to the south; generals and soldiers were successively enfeoffed.
translations.idiomatic: From this time afterward, they sent out armies to attack the strong Hu to the north, executed the strong Yue to the south; generals and soldiers were successively enfeoffed. (translated).

translations.literal: The Grand Historian said: The Xiongnu broke off the peace alliance and attacked the border passes along the route; Minyue arbitrarily invaded, Dong'ou requested to surrender. Two barbarian tribes mutually invaded, at the time when Han was at its most flourishing, from this one knows that meritorious ministers received enfeoffments comparable to their ancestors. Why is this? Since the Poetry and Documents speak of the Three Dynasties 'repelling the Rong and Di, punishing Jing and Tu', the Grand Historian said: Duke Huan of Qi crossed Yan to attack the Shanrong, King Wuling with his small state of Zhao subdued the Chanyu, Duke Mu of Qin used Baili to hegemonize the Western Rong, the rulers of Wu and Chu used the feudal lords to make the Hundred Yue serve. How much more so with China unified, the enlightened Son of Heaven above, combining civil and military, sweeping across the four seas, internally gathering crowds of millions, how could they peacefully not conduct border campaigns! From this time afterward, they sent out armies to attack the strong Hu to the north, executed the strong Yue to the south, generals and soldiers were successively enfeoffed.

cells.content: 涅陽。
cells.literal: Nie Yang.
cells.idiomatic: Nie Yang. (translated).

cells.content: 以朝鮮相路人，漢兵至，首先降，道死，其子侯。
cells.literal: As Chaoxian prime minister Lu Ren, Han troops arrived, first surrendered, died on road, son Marquis.
cells.idiomatic: As Chaoxian prime minister Lu Ren, Han troops arrived, first surrendered, died on road, son Marquis. (translated).

cells.content: 三。四年三月壬寅，康侯子最元年。
cells.literal: Three. Fourth year third month ren yin, Marquis Kang Zi Zui first year.
cells.idiomatic: Three. Fourth year third month ren yin, Marquis Kang Zi Zui first year. (translated).

cells.content: 二。太初二年，侯最死，無後，國除。
cells.literal: Two. Taichu second year, Marquis Zui died, no posterity, state abolished.
cells.idiomatic: Two. Taichu second year, Marquis Zui died, no posterity, state abolished. (translated).

sentences.zh: 後進好事儒者褚先生曰：太史公記事盡於孝武之事，故復修記孝昭以來功臣侯者，編於左方，令後好事者得覽觀成敗長短絕世之適，得以自戒焉。

translations.literal: Later scholar who loved affairs Mr. Chu said: The Grand Historian recorded events ending with Emperor Wu's affairs, therefore again compiled records of meritorious ministers and marquises from Emperor Zhao onward, arranged on the left, so that later scholars who love affairs may view the successes and failures, lengths and shortness of severed generations, and may warn themselves thereby.
translations.idiomatic: Later scholar who loved affairs Mr. Chu said: The Grand Historian recorded events ending with Emperor Wu's affairs, therefore again compiled records of meritorious ministers and marquises from Emperor Zhao onward, arranged on the left, so that later scholars who love affairs may view the successes and failures, lengths and shortness of severed generations, and may warn themselves thereby. (translated).

sentences.zh: 當世之君子，行權合變，度時施宜，希世用事，以建功有土封侯，立名當世，豈不盛哉！

translations.literal: The gentlemen of the present age, exercising authority adapting to change, measuring time applying what is suitable, rarely using affairs to establish merit and obtain land enfeoffed as marquises, establishing names in the present age - is this not flourishing!
translations.idiomatic: The gentlemen of the present age, exercising authority adapting to change, measuring time applying what is suitable, rarely using affairs to establish merit and obtain land enfeoffed as marquises, establishing names in the present age - is this not flourishing! (translated).

sentences.zh: 觀其持滿守成之道，皆不謙讓，驕蹇爭權，喜揚聲譽，知進不知退，終以殺身滅國。

translations.literal: Observe their way of holding fullness guarding completion, all are not modest yielding, arrogant contentious for power, fond of proclaiming reputation, know advance not retreat, in the end kill body extinguish state. (translated).
translations.idiomatic: Observe their way of maintaining success and preserving achievements—all were immodest and contentious, arrogant in their struggle for power, fond of proclaiming their reputations, knowing only how to advance but not retreat, and ultimately perished, destroying their states.

sentences.zh: 以三得之，及身失之，不能傳功於後世，令恩德流子孫，豈不悲哉！

translations.literal: With three obtained it, and in person lost it, cannot transmit merit to later generations, cause beneficence to flow to descendants - is this not sad!
translations.idiomatic: With three obtained it, and in person lost it, cannot transmit merit to later generations, cause beneficence to flow to descendants - is this not sad! (translated).

sentences.zh: 夫龍雒侯曾為前將軍，世俗順善，厚重謹信，不與政事，退讓愛人。

translations.literal: Marquis Longluo once served as Forward General, worldly compliant good, substantial heavy careful trustworthy, did not participate in political affairs, retired yielding loved people. (translated).
translations.idiomatic: Marquis Longluo once served as Forward General. He was worldly, compliant, and good-natured; substantial, heavy, careful, and trustworthy. He did not participate in political affairs, was retiring and yielding, and loved people.

translations.literal: His ancestors arose in the generation of the six ministers of Jin. (translated).
translations.idiomatic: His ancestors arose during the generation of Jin's six great ministers.

sentences.zh: 有土君國以來，為王侯，子孫相承不絕，歷年經世，以至于今，凡百餘歲，豈可與功臣及身失之者同日而語之哉？

translations.literal: Since having land ruling state, being kings and marquises, descendants successively inherited not broken, through years through generations, up to now, altogether over hundred years - how can this be spoken of on the same day as meritorious ministers who lost it in person?
translations.idiomatic: Since having land ruling state, being kings and marquises, descendants successively inherited not broken, through years through generations, up to now, altogether over hundred years - how can this be spoken of on the same day as meritorious ministers who lost it in person? (translated).

translations.literal: Alas, later generations should be warned by this!
translations.idiomatic: Alas, later generations should be warned by this! (translated).

translations.literal: Later scholar who loved affairs Mr. Chu said: The Grand Historian recorded events ending with Emperor Wu's affairs, therefore again compiled records of meritorious ministers and marquises from Emperor Zhao onward, arranged on the left, so that later scholars who love affairs may view the successes and failures, lengths and shortness of severed generations, and may warn themselves thereby. The gentlemen of the present age, exercising authority adapting to change, measuring time applying what is suitable, rarely using affairs to establish merit and obtain land enfeoffed as marquises, establishing names in the present age - is this not flourishing! Observe their way of holding fullness guarding completion, all are not modest yielding, arrogant contentious for power, fond of proclaiming reputation, know advance not retreat, in the end kill body extinguish state. With three obtained it, and in person lost it, cannot transmit merit to later generations, cause beneficence to flow to descendants - is this not sad! Marquis Longluo once served as Forward General, worldly compliant good, substantial heavy careful trustworthy, did not participate in political affairs, retired yielding loved people. His ancestors arose in the generation of the six ministers of Jin. Since having land ruling state, being kings and marquises, descendants successively inherited not broken, through years through generations, up to now, altogether over hundred years - how can this be spoken of on the same day as meritorious ministers who lost it in person? Alas, later generations should be warned by this!

cells.content: 博陸
cells.literal: Bo Lu
cells.idiomatic: Bo Lu (translated).

cells.content: 霍光，家在平陽。以兄驃騎將軍故貴。前事武帝，覺捕得侍中謀反者馬何羅等功侯，三千戶。中輔幼主昭帝，為大將軍。謹信，用事擅治，尊為大司馬，益封邑萬戶。後事宣帝。歷事三主，天下信鄉之，益封二萬戶。子禹代立，謀反，族滅，國除。
cells.literal: Huo Guang, family in Pingyang. Because elder brother Piaoyi General formerly noble. Previously served Emperor Wu, aware captured Palace Attendant plotting rebellion Ma He Luo and others with merit, Marquis, three thousand households. Assisted young lord Emperor Zhao, became Grand General. Careful trustworthy, handled affairs monopolized governance, honored as Grand Marshal, increased fief by ten thousand households. Later served Emperor Xuan. Served three lords, empire trusted and admired him, increased enfeoffment by twenty thousand households. Son Yu succeeded, plotted rebellion, clan exterminated, state abolished.
cells.idiomatic: Huo Guang, family in Pingyang. Because elder brother Piaoyi General formerly noble. Previously served Emperor Wu, aware captured Palace Attendant plotting rebellion Ma He Luo and others with merit, Marquis, three thousand households. Assisted young lord Emperor Zhao, became Grand General. Careful trustworthy, handled affairs monopolized governance, honored as Grand Marshal, increased fief by ten thousand households. Later served Emperor Xuan. Served three lords, empire trusted and admired him, increased enfeoffment by twenty thousand households. Son Yu succeeded, plotted rebellion, clan exterminated, state abolished. (translated).

cells.content: 秺。
cells.literal: Du.
cells.idiomatic: Du. (translated).

cells.content: 金翁叔名日磾，以匈奴休屠王太子從渾邪王將眾五萬，降漢歸義，侍中，事武帝，覺捕侍中謀反者馬何羅等功侯，三千戶。中事昭帝，謹厚，益封三千戶。子弘代立，為奉車都尉，事宣帝。
cells.literal: Jin Weng Shu named Ri Di, as Xiongnu Xiutu king crown prince followed Hunye king led multitude five thousand, surrendered to Han returned righteousness, Palace Attendant, served Emperor Wu, aware captured Palace Attendant plotting rebellion Ma He Luo and others with merit, Marquis, three thousand households. In middle served Emperor Zhao, careful substantial, increased enfeoffment by three thousand households. Son Hong succeeded, became Carriage Escort Colonel, served Emperor Xuan.
cells.idiomatic: Jin Weng Shu named Ri Di, as Xiongnu Xiutu king crown prince followed Hunye king led multitude five thousand, surrendered to Han returned righteousness, Palace Attendant, served Emperor Wu, aware captured Palace Attendant plotting rebellion Ma He Luo and others with merit, Marquis, three thousand households. In middle served Emperor Zhao, careful substantial, increased enfeoffment by three thousand households. Son Hong succeeded, became Carriage Escort Colonel, served Emperor Xuan. (translated).

cells.content: 安陽。
cells.literal: An Yang.
cells.idiomatic: An Yang. (translated).

cells.content: 上官桀，家在隴西。以善騎射從軍。稍貴，事武帝，為左將軍。覺捕斬侍中謀反者馬何羅弟重合侯通功侯，三千戶。中事昭帝，與大將軍霍光爭權，因以謀反，族滅，國除。
cells.literal: Shangguan Jie, family in Longxi. Skilled at horse archery followed army. Gradually noble, served Emperor Wu, became Left General. Aware captured beheaded Palace Attendant plotting rebellion Ma He Luo younger brother Marquis Tong of Chonghe with merit, Marquis, three thousand households. In middle served Emperor Zhao, with Grand General Huo Guang contended for power, therefore plotted rebellion, clan exterminated, state abolished.
cells.idiomatic: Shangguan Jie, family in Longxi. Skilled at horse archery followed army. Gradually noble, served Emperor Wu, became Left General. Aware captured beheaded Palace Attendant plotting rebellion Ma He Luo younger brother Marquis Tong of Chonghe with merit, Marquis, three thousand households. In middle served Emperor Zhao, with Grand General Huo Guang contended for power, therefore plotted rebellion, clan exterminated, state abolished. (translated).

cells.content: 桑樂。
cells.literal: Sang Le.
cells.idiomatic: Sang Le. (translated).

cells.content: 上官安。以父桀為將軍故貴，侍中，事昭帝。安女為昭帝夫人，立為皇后故侯，三千戶。驕蹇，與大將軍霍光爭權，因以父子謀反，族滅，國除。
cells.literal: Shangguan An. Because father Jie was general therefore noble, Palace Attendant, served Emperor Zhao. An's daughter became Emperor Zhao's consort, established as Empress therefore Marquis, three thousand households. Arrogant contentious, with Grand General Huo Guang contended for power, therefore with father and son plotted rebellion, clan exterminated, state abolished.
cells.idiomatic: Shangguan An. Because father Jie was general therefore noble, Palace Attendant, served Emperor Zhao. An's daughter became Emperor Zhao's consort, established as Empress therefore Marquis, three thousand households. Arrogant contentious, with Grand General Huo Guang contended for power, therefore with father and son plotted rebellion, clan exterminated, state abolished. (translated).

cells.content: 富平。
cells.literal: Fu Ping.
cells.idiomatic: Fu Ping. (translated).

cells.content: 張安世，家在杜陵。以故御史大夫張湯子武帝時給事尚書，為尚書令。事昭帝，謹厚習事，為光祿勳右將軍。輔政十三年，無適過，侯，三千戶。及事宣帝，代霍光為大司馬，用事，益封萬六千戶。子延壽代立，為太僕，侍中。
cells.literal: Zhang Anshi, family in Duling. As former Grand Minister of Justice Zhang Tang's son during Emperor Wu time gave service to Shangshu, became Shangshu Order. Served Emperor Zhao, careful substantial practiced affairs, became Guanglu Xun Right General. Assisted governance thirteen years, no faults, Marquis, three thousand households. And served Emperor Xuan, replaced Huo Guang as Grand Marshal, handled affairs, increased enfeoffment by sixteen thousand households. Son Yan Shou succeeded, became Grand Servant Treasurer, Palace Attendant.
cells.idiomatic: Zhang Anshi, family in Duling. As former Grand Minister of Justice Zhang Tang's son during Emperor Wu time gave service to Shangshu, became Shangshu Order. Served Emperor Zhao, careful substantial practiced affairs, became Guanglu Xun Right General. Assisted governance thirteen years, no faults, Marquis, three thousand households. And served Emperor Xuan, replaced Huo Guang as Grand Marshal, handled affairs, increased enfeoffment by sixteen thousand households. Son Yan Shou succeeded, became Grand Servant Treasurer, Palace Attendant. (translated).

cells.content: 義陽。
cells.literal: Yi Yang.
cells.idiomatic: Yi Yang. (translated).

cells.content: 傅介子，家在北地。以從軍為郎，為平樂監。昭帝時，刺殺外國王，天子下詔書曰：「平樂監傅介子使外國，殺樓蘭王，以直報怨，不煩師，有功，其以邑千三百戶封介子為義陽侯。」子厲代立，爭財相告，有罪，國除。
cells.literal: Fu Jiezhi, family in Beidi. Followed army became Palace Attendant, became Ping Le Supervisor. Emperor Zhao time, assassinated foreign king, Son of Heaven issued edict saying: 'Ping Le Supervisor Fu Jiezhi sent to foreign country, killed Lou Lan king, to directly avenge resentment, not troubled teachers, has merit, therefore with fief one thousand three hundred households enfeoff Fu Jiezhi as Marquis of Yi Yang.' Son Li succeeded, disputed property mutually accused, committed crime, state abolished.
cells.idiomatic: Fu Jiezhi, family in Beidi. Followed army became Palace Attendant, became Ping Le Supervisor. Emperor Zhao time, assassinated foreign king, Son of Heaven issued edict saying: 'Ping Le Supervisor Fu Jiezhi sent to foreign country, killed Lou Lan king, to directly avenge resentment, not troubled teachers, has merit, therefore with fief one thousand three hundred households enfeoff Fu Jiezhi as Marquis of Yi Yang.' Son Li succeeded, disputed property mutually accused, committed crime, state abolished. (translated).

cells.content: 商利。
cells.literal: Shang Li.
cells.idiomatic: Shang Li. (translated).

cells.content: 王山，齊人也。故為丞相史，會騎將軍上官安謀反，山說安與俱入丞相，斬安。山以軍功為侯，三千戶。上書願治民，為代太守。為人所上書言，繫獄當死，會赦，出為庶人，國除。
cells.literal: Wang Shan, Qiren. Formerly Chancellor Historian, met Cavalry General Shangguan An plotted rebellion, Shan persuaded An together entered Chancellor, beheaded An. Shan with military merit became Marquis, three thousand households. Memorialized wished to govern people, became Grand Administrator of Dai. Person memorialized spoke of him, imprisoned should die, met amnesty, released as commoner, state abolished.
cells.idiomatic: Wang Shan, Qiren. Formerly Chancellor Historian, met Cavalry General Shangguan An plotted rebellion, Shan persuaded An together entered Chancellor, beheaded An. Shan with military merit became Marquis, three thousand households. Memorialized wished to govern people, became Grand Administrator of Dai. Person memorialized spoke of him, imprisoned should die, met amnesty, released as commoner, state abolished. (translated).

cells.content: 建平。
cells.literal: Jian Ping.
cells.idiomatic: Jian Ping. (translated).

cells.content: 杜延年。以故御史大夫杜周子給事大將軍幕府，發覺謀反者騎將軍上官安等罪，封為侯，邑二千七百戶，拜為太僕。元年，出為西河太守。五鳳三年，入為御史大夫。
cells.literal: Du Yannian. As former Grand Minister of Justice Du Zhou's son gave service Grand General tent headquarters, discovered plotting rebellion Cavalry General Shangguan An and others crimes, enfeoffed as Marquis, fief two thousand seven hundred households, appointed Grand Servant Treasurer. First year, went out as Grand Administrator of Xihe. Wufeng third year, entered as Grand Minister of Justice.
cells.idiomatic: Du Yannian. As former Grand Minister of Justice Du Zhou's son gave service Grand General tent headquarters, discovered plotting rebellion Cavalry General Shangguan An and others crimes, enfeoffed as Marquis, fief two thousand seven hundred households, appointed Grand Servant Treasurer. First year, went out as Grand Administrator of Xihe. Wufeng third year, entered as Grand Minister of Justice. (translated).

cells.content: 弋陽。
cells.literal: Yi Yang.
cells.idiomatic: Yi Yang. (translated).

cells.content: 任宮。以故上林尉捕格謀反者左將軍上官桀，殺之便門，封為侯，二千戶。後為太常，及行衛尉事。節儉謹信，以壽終，傳於子孫。
cells.literal: Ren Gong. As former Shanglin Guard captured checked plotting rebellion Left General Shangguan Jie, killed at convenient gate, enfeoffed as Marquis, two thousand households. Later became Grand Master of Ceremonies, and performed Commander of Guards affairs. Frugal careful trustworthy, ended with longevity, transmitted to descendants.
cells.idiomatic: Ren Gong. As former Shanglin Guard captured checked plotting rebellion Left General Shangguan Jie, killed at convenient gate, enfeoffed as Marquis, two thousand households. Later became Grand Master of Ceremonies, and performed Commander of Guards affairs. Frugal careful trustworthy, ended with longevity, transmitted to descendants. (translated).

cells.content: 宜城。
cells.literal: Yi Cheng.
cells.idiomatic: Yi Cheng. (translated).

cells.content: 燕倉。以故大將軍幕府軍吏發謀反者騎將軍上官安罪有功，封侯，邑二千戶。為汝南太守，有能名。
cells.literal: Yan Cang. As former Grand General tent headquarters army official discovered plotting rebellion Cavalry General Shangguan An crime had merit, enfeoffed Marquis, fief two thousand households. Became Grand Administrator of Runan, had able reputation.
cells.idiomatic: Yan Cang. As former Grand General tent headquarters army official discovered plotting rebellion Cavalry General Shangguan An crime had merit, enfeoffed Marquis, fief two thousand households. Became Grand Administrator of Runan, had able reputation. (translated).

cells.content: 宜春。
cells.literal: Yi Chun.
cells.idiomatic: Yi Chun. (translated).

cells.content: 王訢，家在齊。本小吏佐史，稍遷至右輔都尉。武帝數幸扶風郡，訢共置辦，拜為右扶風。至孝昭時，代桑弘羊為御史大夫。元鳳三年，代田千秋為丞相，封二千戶。立二年，為人所上書言暴，自殺，不殊。子代立，為屬國都尉。
cells.literal: Wang Xun, family in Qi. Originally small official assistant historian, gradually promoted to Right Auxiliary Colonel. Emperor Wu frequently visited Fufeng commandery, Xun together arranged preparation, appointed Right Fufeng. To Emperor Zhao time, replaced Sang Hongyang as Grand Minister of Justice. Yuanfeng third year, replaced Tian Qianqiu as Chancellor, enfeoffed two thousand households. Stood two years, person memorialized spoke of tyranny, suicide, not clear. Son succeeded, became Dependent State Colonel.
cells.idiomatic: Wang Xun, family in Qi. Originally small official assistant historian, gradually promoted to Right Auxiliary Colonel. Emperor Wu frequently visited Fufeng commandery, Xun together arranged preparation, appointed Right Fufeng. To Emperor Zhao time, replaced Sang Hongyang as Grand Minister of Justice. Yuanfeng third year, replaced Tian Qianqiu as Chancellor, enfeoffed two thousand households. Stood two years, person memorialized spoke of tyranny, suicide, not clear. Son succeeded, became Dependent State Colonel. (translated).

cells.content: 安平。
cells.literal: An Ping.
cells.idiomatic: An Ping. (translated).

cells.content: 楊敞，家在華陰。故給事大將軍幕府，稍遷至大司農，為御史大夫。元鳳六年，代王訢為丞相，封二千戶。立二年，病死。子賁代立，十三年病死。子翁君代立，為典屬國。三歲，以季父惲故出惡言，繫獄當死，得免，為庶人，國除。
cells.literal: Yang Chang, family in Huayin. Formerly gave service Grand General tent headquarters, gradually promoted to Grand Agrarian, became Grand Minister of Justice. Yuanfeng sixth year, replaced Wang Xun as Chancellor, enfeoffed two thousand households. Stood two years, died of illness. Son Ben succeeded, thirteen years died of illness. Son Weng Jun succeeded, became Superintendent of Dependent States. Three years, because maternal uncle Yun crime spoke evil words, imprisoned should die, obtained pardon, became commoner, state abolished.
cells.idiomatic: Yang Chang, family in Huayin. Formerly gave service Grand General tent headquarters, gradually promoted to Grand Agrarian, became Grand Minister of Justice. Yuanfeng sixth year, replaced Wang Xun as Chancellor, enfeoffed two thousand households. Stood two years, died of illness. Son Ben succeeded, thirteen years died of illness. Son Weng Jun succeeded, became Superintendent of Dependent States. Three years, because maternal uncle Yun crime spoke evil words, imprisoned should die, obtained pardon, became commoner, state abolished. (translated).

cells.content: 陽平。
cells.literal: Yang Ping.
cells.idiomatic: Yang Ping. (translated).

cells.content: 蔡義，家在溫。故師受韓詩，為博士，給事大將軍幕府，為杜城門候。入侍中，授昭帝韓詩，為御史大夫。是時年八十，衰老，常兩人扶持乃能行。然公卿大臣議，以為為人主師，當以為相。以元平元年代楊敞為丞相，封二千戶。病死，絕無後，國除。
cells.literal: Cai Yi, family in Wen. Formerly teacher received Han poetry, became erudite. Gave service Grand General tent headquarters, became Ducheng gate guard. Entered Palace Attendant, taught Emperor Zhao Han poetry, became Grand Minister of Justice. At this time aged eighty, declining old, constantly two people supported then could walk. Yet high officials ministers discussed, believed as ruler's teacher, should become chancellor. With Yuanping first year replaced Yang Chang as Chancellor, enfeoffed two thousand households. Died of illness, completely no posterity, state abolished.
cells.idiomatic: Cai Yi, family in Wen. Formerly teacher received Han poetry, became erudite. Gave service Grand General tent headquarters, became Ducheng gate guard. Entered Palace Attendant, taught Emperor Zhao Han poetry, became Grand Minister of Justice. At this time aged eighty, declining old, constantly two people supported then could walk. Yet high officials ministers discussed, believed as ruler's teacher, should become chancellor. With Yuanping first year replaced Yang Chang as Chancellor, enfeoffed two thousand households. Died of illness, completely no posterity, state abolished. (translated).

cells.content: 扶陽。
cells.literal: Fu Yang.
cells.idiomatic: Fu Yang. (translated).

cells.content: 韋賢，家在魯。通詩、禮、尚書，為博士，授魯大儒，入侍中，為昭帝師，遷為光祿大夫，大鴻臚，長信少府。以為人主師，本始三年代蔡義為丞相，封扶陽侯，千八百戶。為丞相五歲，多恩，不習吏事，免相就第，病死。子玄成代立，為太常。坐祠廟騎，奪爵，為關內侯。
cells.literal: Wei Xian, family in Lu. Mastered poetry, rites, Shangshu, became erudite, taught Lu great Confucian, entered Palace Attendant, became Emperor Zhao teacher, promoted to Guanglu Dafu, Grand Honglu, Changxin Shaofu. Believed as ruler teacher, Benshi third year replaced Cai Yi as Chancellor, enfeoffed Marquis of Fuyang, one thousand eight hundred households. Served as Chancellor five years, much benevolence, not practiced official affairs, dismissed chancellor went to residence, died of illness. Son Xuan Cheng succeeded, became Grand Master of Ceremonies. Convicted of temple sacrifice rode horse, title stripped, became Guan Nei Hou.
cells.idiomatic: Wei Xian, family in Lu. Mastered poetry, rites, Shangshu, became erudite, taught Lu great Confucian, entered Palace Attendant, became Emperor Zhao teacher, promoted to Guanglu Dafu, Grand Honglu, Changxin Shaofu. Believed as ruler teacher, Benshi third year replaced Cai Yi as Chancellor, enfeoffed Marquis of Fuyang, one thousand eight hundred households. Served as Chancellor five years, much benevolence, not practiced official affairs, dismissed chancellor went to residence, died of illness. Son Xuan Cheng succeeded, became Grand Master of Ceremonies. Convicted of temple sacrifice rode horse, title stripped, became Guan Nei Hou. (translated).

cells.content: 平陵。
cells.literal: Ping Ling.
cells.idiomatic: Ping Ling. (translated).

cells.content: 范明友，家在隴西。以家世習外國事，使護西羌。事昭帝，拜為度遼將軍，擊烏桓功侯，二千戶。取霍光女為妻。地節四年，與諸霍子禹等謀反，族滅，國除。
cells.literal: Fan Mingyou, family in Longxi. With family generation practiced foreign affairs, sent to protect Western Qiang. Served Emperor Zhao, appointed Diao General, attacked Wuhuan with merit, Marquis, two thousand households. Took Huo Guang daughter as wife. Diji fourth year, with various Huo sons Yu etc. plotted rebellion, clan exterminated, state abolished.
cells.idiomatic: Fan Mingyou, family in Longxi. With family generation practiced foreign affairs, sent to protect Western Qiang. Served Emperor Zhao, appointed Diao General, attacked Wuhuan with merit, Marquis, two thousand households. Took Huo Guang daughter as wife. Diji fourth year, with various Huo sons Yu etc. plotted rebellion, clan exterminated, state abolished. (translated).

cells.content: 營平。
cells.literal: Ying Ping.
cells.idiomatic: Ying Ping. (translated).

cells.content: 趙充國。以隴西騎士從軍得官，侍中，事武帝。數將兵擊匈奴有功，為護軍都尉，侍中，事昭帝。昭帝崩，議立宣帝，決疑定策，以安宗廟功侯，封二千五百戶。
cells.literal: Zhao Chongguo. As Longxi cavalry soldier followed army obtained office, Palace Attendant, served Emperor Wu. Frequently led troops attacked Xiongnu had merit, became Protector Army Colonel, Palace Attendant, served Emperor Zhao. Emperor Zhao collapsed, discussed establishing Emperor Xuan, decided doubt settled plan, with pacified ancestral temple merit, Marquis, enfeoffed two thousand five hundred households.
cells.idiomatic: Zhao Chongguo. As Longxi cavalry soldier followed army obtained office, Palace Attendant, served Emperor Wu. Frequently led troops attacked Xiongnu had merit, became Protector Army Colonel, Palace Attendant, served Emperor Zhao. Emperor Zhao collapsed, discussed establishing Emperor Xuan, decided doubt settled plan, with pacified ancestral temple merit, Marquis, enfeoffed two thousand five hundred households. (translated).

cells.content: 陽成。
cells.literal: Yang Cheng.
cells.idiomatic: Yang Cheng. (translated).

cells.content: 田延年。以軍吏事昭帝；發覺上官桀謀反事，後留遲不得封，為大司農。本造廢昌邑王議立宣帝，決疑定策，以安宗廟功侯，二千七百戶。逢昭帝崩，方上事並急，因以盜都內錢三千萬。發覺，自殺，國除。
cells.literal: Tian Yannian. As army official served Emperor Zhao; discovered Shangguan Jie plotting rebellion affair, later detained not obtained enfeoffment, became Grand Agrarian. Originally created abolished Changyi king discussed establishing Emperor Xuan, decided doubt settled plan, with pacified ancestral temple merit, Marquis, two thousand seven hundred households. Met Emperor Zhao collapse, just presented affairs simultaneously urgent, therefore stole capital money thirty million. Discovered, suicide, state abolished.
cells.idiomatic: Tian Yannian. As army official served Emperor Zhao; discovered Shangguan Jie plotting rebellion affair, later detained not obtained enfeoffment, became Grand Agrarian. Originally created abolished Changyi king discussed establishing Emperor Xuan, decided doubt settled plan, with pacified ancestral temple merit, Marquis, two thousand seven hundred households. Met Emperor Zhao collapse, just presented affairs simultaneously urgent, therefore stole capital money thirty million. Discovered, suicide, state abolished. (translated).

cells.content: 平丘。
cells.literal: Ping Qiu.
cells.idiomatic: Ping Qiu. (translated).

cells.content: 王遷，家在衛。為尚書郎，習刀筆之文。侍中，事昭帝。帝崩，立宣帝，決疑定策，以安宗廟功侯，二千戶。為光祿大夫，秩中二千石。坐受諸侯王金錢財。漏洩中事，誅死，國除。
cells.literal: Wang Qian, family in Wei. Served as Shangshu Attendant, practiced knife brush writing. Palace Attendant, served Emperor Zhao. Emperor collapsed, established Emperor Xuan, decided doubt settled plan, with pacified ancestral temple merit, Marquis, two thousand households. Became Guanglu Dafu, rank middle two thousand shi. Convicted of receiving various nobles gold money property. Leaked palace affairs, executed, state abolished.
cells.idiomatic: Wang Qian, family in Wei. Served as Shangshu Attendant, practiced knife brush writing. Palace Attendant, served Emperor Zhao. Emperor collapsed, established Emperor Xuan, decided doubt settled plan, with pacified ancestral temple merit, Marquis, two thousand households. Became Guanglu Dafu, rank middle two thousand shi. Convicted of receiving various nobles gold money property. Leaked palace affairs, executed, state abolished. (translated).

cells.content: 樂成。
cells.literal: Le Cheng.
cells.idiomatic: Le Cheng. (translated).

cells.content: 霍山。山者，大將軍光兄子也。光未死時上書曰：「臣兄驃騎將軍去病從軍有功，病死，賜謚景桓侯，絕無後，臣光願以所封東武陽邑三千五百戶分與山。」天子許之，拜山為侯。後坐謀反，族滅，國除。
cells.literal: Huo Shan. Shan was Grand General Guang's elder brother's son. Guang not yet dead memorialized saying: 'Minister's elder brother Cavalry General Qu Bing followed army had merit, died of illness, granted posthumous title Jing Huan Hou, completely no posterity, minister Guang wishes with enfeoffed Dong Wuyang three thousand five hundred households divided with Shan.' Son of Heaven permitted, appointed Shan as Marquis. Later convicted of plotting rebellion, clan exterminated, state abolished.
cells.idiomatic: Huo Shan. Shan was Grand General Guang's elder brother's son. Guang not yet dead memorialized saying: 'Minister's elder brother Cavalry General Qu Bing followed army had merit, died of illness, granted posthumous title Jing Huan Hou, completely no posterity, minister Guang wishes with enfeoffed Dong Wuyang three thousand five hundred households divided with Shan.' Son of Heaven permitted, appointed Shan as Marquis. Later convicted of plotting rebellion, clan exterminated, state abolished. (translated).

cells.content: 冠軍。
cells.literal: Guan Jun.
cells.idiomatic: Guan Jun. (translated).

cells.content: 霍雲。以大將軍兄驃騎將軍適孫為侯。地節三年，天子下詔書曰「驃騎將軍去病擊匈奴有功，封為冠軍侯。薨卒，子侯代立，病死無後。春秋之義，善善及子孫，其以邑三千戶封雲為冠軍侯。」後坐謀反，族滅，國除。
cells.literal: Huo Yun. With Grand General elder brother Cavalry General Di Sun as Marquis. Diji third year, Son of Heaven issued edict saying 'Cavalry General Qu Bing attacked Xiongnu had merit, enfeoffed as Guan Jun Hou. Died, son Marquis succeeded, died of illness no posterity. Spring and Autumn righteousness, good goodness extends to descendants, therefore with fief three thousand households enfeoff Yun as Guan Jun Hou.' Later convicted of plotting rebellion, clan exterminated, state abolished.
cells.idiomatic: Huo Yun. With Grand General elder brother Cavalry General Di Sun as Marquis. Diji third year, Son of Heaven issued edict saying 'Cavalry General Qu Bing attacked Xiongnu had merit, enfeoffed as Guan Jun Hou. Died, son Marquis succeeded, died of illness no posterity. Spring and Autumn righteousness, good goodness extends to descendants, therefore with fief three thousand households enfeoff Yun as Guan Jun Hou.' Later convicted of plotting rebellion, clan exterminated, state abolished. (translated).

cells.content: 平恩。
cells.literal: Ping En.
cells.idiomatic: Ping En. (translated).

cells.content: 許廣漢，家昌邑。坐事下蠶室，獨有一女，嫁之。宣帝未立時，素與廣漢出入相通，卜相者言當大貴，以故廣漢施恩甚厚。地節三年，封為侯，邑三千戶。病死無後，國除。
cells.literal: Xu Guanghan, family Changyi. Convicted of affairs descended silkworm room, alone had one daughter, married to her. Emperor Xuan not yet established, originally with Guanghan entered exited mutually familiar, fortune tellers said should greatly noble, therefore Guanghan bestowed favor very thick. Diji third year, enfeoffed as Marquis, fief three thousand households. Died of illness no posterity, state abolished.
cells.idiomatic: Xu Guanghan, family Changyi. Convicted of affairs descended silkworm room, alone had one daughter, married to her. Emperor Xuan not yet established, originally with Guanghan entered exited mutually familiar, fortune tellers said should greatly noble, therefore Guanghan bestowed favor very thick. Diji third year, enfeoffed as Marquis, fief three thousand households. Died of illness no posterity, state abolished. (translated).

cells.content: 昌水。
cells.literal: Chang Shui.
cells.idiomatic: Chang Shui. (translated).

cells.content: 田廣明。故郎，為司馬，稍遷至南郡都尉、淮陽太守、鴻臚、左馮翊。昭帝崩，議廢昌邑王，立宣帝，決疑定策，以安宗廟。本始三年，封為侯，邑二千三百戶。為御史大夫。後為祁連將軍，擊匈奴，軍不至質，當死，自殺，國除。
cells.literal: Tian Guangming. Formerly Palace Attendant, became Major, gradually promoted to Nanhun Grand Administrator, Huaiyang Grand Administrator, Honglu, Left Fengyi. Emperor Zhao collapsed, discussed abolished Changyi king, established Emperor Xuan, decided doubt settled plan, with pacified ancestral temple merit. Benshi third year, enfeoffed as Marquis, fief two thousand three hundred households. Became Grand Minister of Justice. Later became Qilian General, attacked Xiongnu, army not reached hostage, should die, suicide, state abolished.
cells.idiomatic: Tian Guangming. Formerly Palace Attendant, became Major, gradually promoted to Nanhun Grand Administrator, Huaiyang Grand Administrator, Honglu, Left Fengyi. Emperor Zhao collapsed, discussed abolished Changyi king, established Emperor Xuan, decided doubt settled plan, with pacified ancestral temple merit. Benshi third year, enfeoffed as Marquis, fief two thousand three hundred households. Became Grand Minister of Justice. Later became Qilian General, attacked Xiongnu, army not reached hostage, should die, suicide, state abolished. (translated).

cells.content: 高平。
cells.literal: Gao Ping.
cells.idiomatic: Gao Ping. (translated).

cells.content: 魏相，家在濟陰。少學易，為府卒史，以賢良舉為茂陵令，遷河南太守。坐賊殺不辜，繫獄，當死，會赦，免為庶人。有詔守茂陵令，為楊州刺史，入為諫議大夫，復為河南太守，遷為大司農、御史大夫。地節三年，譖毀韋賢，代為丞相，封千五百戶。病死，長子賓代立，坐祠廟失侯。
cells.literal: Wei Xiang, family in Jiyin. Young studied Yi, became headquarters soldier historian, with worthy good selected as Maoling magistrate, promoted Henan Grand Administrator. Convicted of bandits killed innocent, imprisoned should die, met amnesty, dismissed as commoner. Had edict guarded Maoling magistrate, became Yangzhou Inspector, entered as Admonishing Official Dafu, again became Henan Grand Administrator, promoted Grand Agrarian, Grand Minister of Justice. Diji third year, slandered Wei Xian, replaced as Chancellor, enfeoffed one thousand five hundred households. Died of illness, eldest son Bin succeeded, convicted of temple sacrifice lost marquisate.
cells.idiomatic: Wei Xiang, family in Jiyin. Young studied Yi, became headquarters soldier historian, with worthy good selected as Maoling magistrate, promoted Henan Grand Administrator. Convicted of bandits killed innocent, imprisoned should die, met amnesty, dismissed as commoner. Had edict guarded Maoling magistrate, became Yangzhou Inspector, entered as Admonishing Official Dafu, again became Henan Grand Administrator, promoted Grand Agrarian, Grand Minister of Justice. Diji third year, slandered Wei Xian, replaced as Chancellor, enfeoffed one thousand five hundred households. Died of illness, eldest son Bin succeeded, convicted of temple sacrifice lost marquisate. (translated).

cells.content: 博望。
cells.literal: Bo Wang.
cells.idiomatic: Bo Wang. (translated).

cells.content: 許中翁。以平恩侯許廣漢弟封為侯，邑二千戶。亦故有私恩，為長樂衛尉。死，子延年代立。
cells.literal: Xu Zhong Weng. With Ping En Marquis Xu Guanghan younger brother enfeoffed as Marquis, fief two thousand households. Also formerly had private favor, became Chang Le Guard Commander. Died, son Yan Nian succeeded.
cells.idiomatic: Xu Zhong Weng. With Ping En Marquis Xu Guanghan younger brother enfeoffed as Marquis, fief two thousand households. Also formerly had private favor, became Chang Le Guard Commander. Died, son Yan Nian succeeded. (translated).

cells.content: 樂平
cells.literal: Le Ping
cells.idiomatic: Le Ping (translated).

cells.content: 許翁孫。以平恩侯許廣漢少弟故為侯，封二千戶。拜為彊弩將軍，擊破西羌，還，更拜為大司馬、光祿勳。亦故有私恩，故得封。嗜酒好色，以早病死。子湯代立。
cells.literal: Xu Weng Sun. With Ping En Marquis Xu Guanghan youngest younger brother therefore as Marquis, enfeoffed two thousand households. Appointed Strong Crossbow General, attacked broke Western Qiang, returned, again appointed Grand Marshal, Guanglu Xun. Also formerly had private favor, therefore obtained enfeoffment. Addicted to wine fond of sex, died early of illness. Son Tang succeeded.
cells.idiomatic: Xu Weng Sun. With Ping En Marquis Xu Guanghan youngest younger brother therefore as Marquis, enfeoffed two thousand households. Appointed Strong Crossbow General, attacked broke Western Qiang, returned, again appointed Grand Marshal, Guanglu Xun. Also formerly had private favor, therefore obtained enfeoffment. Addicted to wine fond of sex, died early of illness. Son Tang succeeded. (translated).

cells.content: 將陵
cells.literal: Jiang Ling
cells.idiomatic: Jiang Ling (translated).

cells.content: 史子回。以宣帝大母家封為侯，二千六百戶，與平臺侯昆弟行也。子回妻宜君，故成王孫，嫉妒，絞殺侍婢四十餘人，盜斷婦人初產子臂膝以為媚道。為人所上書言，論棄市。子回以外家故，不失侯。
cells.literal: Shi Zi Hui. With Emperor Xuan great maternal grandmother family enfeoffed as Marquis, two thousand six hundred households, with Platform Marquis brothers in row. Zi Hui wife Yi Jun, formerly Cheng Wang Sun, jealous, strangled killed serving maids over forty people, stole cut woman first childbirth child arms knees as charm way. Person memorialized spoke of, sentenced abandoned market. Zi Hui because maternal family reason, not lost marquisate.
cells.idiomatic: Shi Zi Hui. With Emperor Xuan great maternal grandmother family enfeoffed as Marquis, two thousand six hundred households, with Platform Marquis brothers in row. Zi Hui wife Yi Jun, formerly Cheng Wang Sun, jealous, strangled killed serving maids over forty people, stole cut woman first childbirth child arms knees as charm way. Person memorialized spoke of, sentenced abandoned market. Zi Hui because maternal family reason, not lost marquisate. (translated).

cells.content: 平臺。
cells.literal: Ping Tai.
cells.idiomatic: Ping Tai. (translated).

cells.content: 史子叔。以宣帝大母家封為侯，二千五百戶。衛太子時，史氏內一女於太子，嫁一女魯王，今見魯王亦史氏外孫也。外家有親，以故貴，數得賞賜。
cells.literal: Shi Zi Shu. With Emperor Xuan great maternal grandmother family enfeoffed as Marquis, two thousand five hundred households. Crown Prince time, Shi clan married one daughter to Crown Prince, married one daughter to Lu king, now seen Lu king also Shi clan daughter's son. Maternal family had relatives, therefore noble, frequently obtained rewards and bestowals.
cells.idiomatic: Shi Zi Shu. With Emperor Xuan great maternal grandmother family enfeoffed as Marquis, two thousand five hundred households. Crown Prince time, Shi clan married one daughter to Crown Prince, married one daughter to Lu king, now seen Lu king also Shi clan daughter's son. Maternal family had relatives, therefore noble, frequently obtained rewards and bestowals. (translated).

cells.content: 樂陵。
cells.literal: Le Ling.
cells.idiomatic: Le Ling. (translated).

cells.content: 史子長。以宣帝大母家貴，侍中，重厚忠信。以發覺霍氏謀反事，封三千五百戶。
cells.literal: Shi Zi Chang. With Emperor Xuan great maternal grandmother family noble, Palace Attendant, substantial heavy loyal trustworthy. With discovered Huo clan plotting rebellion affair, enfeoffed three thousand five hundred households.
cells.idiomatic: Shi Zi Chang. With Emperor Xuan great maternal grandmother family noble, Palace Attendant, substantial heavy loyal trustworthy. With discovered Huo clan plotting rebellion affair, enfeoffed three thousand five hundred households. (translated).

cells.content: 博成。
cells.literal: Bo Cheng.
cells.idiomatic: Bo Cheng. (translated).

cells.content: 張章，父故潁川人，為長安亭長。失官，之北闕上書，寄宿霍氏第舍，臥馬櫪閒，夜聞養馬奴相與語，言諸霍氏子孫欲謀反狀，因上書告反，為侯，封三千戶。
cells.literal: Zhang Zhang, father formerly Yingchuan person, served as Chang'an pavilion chief. Lost office, went to north gate memorialized, lodged in Huo clan residence house, slept in horse stable midst, night heard horse raising slave mutually spoke, spoke various Huo clan sons and grandsons wanted plotting rebellion condition, therefore memorialized reported rebellion, became Marquis, enfeoffed three thousand households.
cells.idiomatic: Zhang Zhang, father formerly Yingchuan person, served as Chang'an pavilion chief. Lost office, went to north gate memorialized, lodged in Huo clan residence house, slept in horse stable midst, night heard horse raising slave mutually spoke, spoke various Huo clan sons and grandsons wanted plotting rebellion condition, therefore memorialized reported rebellion, became Marquis, enfeoffed three thousand households. (translated).

cells.content: 都成。
cells.literal: Du Cheng.
cells.idiomatic: Du Cheng. (translated).

cells.content: 金安上，先故匈奴。以發覺故大將軍霍光子禹等謀反事有功，封侯，二千八百戶。安上者，奉車都尉秺侯從群子。行謹善，退讓以自持，欲傳功德於子孫。
cells.literal: Jin An Shang, formerly Xiongnu. With discovered former Grand General Huo Guang son Yu etc. plotting rebellion affair had merit, enfeoffed Marquis, two thousand eight hundred households. An Shang was Carriage Escort Colonel Du Hou Cong Qun son. Conduct careful good, retired yielding self held, wished transmit merit virtue to descendants.
cells.idiomatic: Jin An Shang, formerly Xiongnu. With discovered former Grand General Huo Guang son Yu etc. plotting rebellion affair had merit, enfeoffed Marquis, two thousand eight hundred households. An Shang was Carriage Escort Colonel Du Hou Cong Qun son. Conduct careful good, retired yielding self held, wished transmit merit virtue to descendants. (translated).

cells.content: 平通。
cells.literal: Ping Tong.
cells.idiomatic: Ping Tong. (translated).

cells.content: 楊惲，家在華陰，故丞相楊敞少子，任為郎。好士，自喜知人，居眾人中常與人顏色，以故高昌侯董忠引與屏語，言霍氏謀反狀，共發覺告反侯，二千戶，為光祿動。到五鳳四年，作為妖言，大逆罪腰斬，國除。
cells.literal: Yang Yun, family in Huayin, former Chancellor Yang Chang youngest son, appointed Palace Attendant. Loved scholars, self happy knew people, among crowd constantly with people countenance, therefore Gaochang Hou Dong Zhong led with screen spoke, spoke Huo clan plotting rebellion condition, together discovered reported rebellion, Marquis, two thousand households, became Guanglu Xun. Arrived Wufeng fourth year, made demonic words, great rebellion crime waist cut, state abolished.
cells.idiomatic: Yang Yun, family in Huayin, former Chancellor Yang Chang youngest son, appointed Palace Attendant. Loved scholars, self happy knew people, among crowd constantly with people countenance, therefore Gaochang Hou Dong Zhong led with screen spoke, spoke Huo clan plotting rebellion condition, together discovered reported rebellion, Marquis, two thousand households, became Guanglu Xun. Arrived Wufeng fourth year, made demonic words, great rebellion crime waist cut, state abolished. (translated).

cells.content: 高昌。
cells.literal: Gao Chang.
cells.idiomatic: Gao Chang. (translated).

cells.content: 董忠，父故潁川陽翟人，以習書詣長安。忠有材力，能騎射，用短兵，給事期門。與張章相習知，章告語忠霍禹謀反狀，忠以語常侍騎郎楊惲，共發覺告反，侯，二千戶。今為梟騎都尉，侍中。坐祠宗廟乘小車，奪百戶。
cells.literal: Dong Zhong, father formerly Yingchuan Yangdi person, with practiced writing went to Chang'an. Zhong had talent strength, could ride shoot, used short weapons, gave service Qimen. With Zhang Zhang mutually practiced knew, Zhang told Zhong Huo Yu plotting rebellion condition, Zhong with spoke to Chang Shi Cavalry Attendant Yang Yun, together discovered reported rebellion, Marquis, two thousand households. Now as Brave Cavalry Colonel, Palace Attendant. Convicted of temple ancestral temple rode small carriage, stripped one hundred households.
cells.idiomatic: Dong Zhong, father formerly Yingchuan Yangdi person, with practiced writing went to Chang'an. Zhong had talent strength, could ride shoot, used short weapons, gave service Qimen. With Zhang Zhang mutually practiced knew, Zhang told Zhong Huo Yu plotting rebellion condition, Zhong with spoke to Chang Shi Cavalry Attendant Yang Yun, together discovered reported rebellion, Marquis, two thousand households. Now as Brave Cavalry Colonel, Palace Attendant. Convicted of temple ancestral temple rode small carriage, stripped one hundred households. (translated).

cells.content: 爰戚
cells.literal: Yuan Qi
cells.idiomatic: Yuan Qi (translated).

cells.content: 趙成。用發覺楚國事侯，二千三百戶。地節元年，楚王與廣陵王謀反，成發覺反狀，天子推恩廣德義，下詔書曰「無治廣陵王」，廣陵不變更。後復坐祝詛滅國，自殺，國除。今帝復立子為廣陵王。
cells.literal: Zhao Cheng. Used discovered Chu state affair, Marquis, two thousand three hundred households. Diji first year, Chu king with Guangling king plotted rebellion, Cheng discovered rebellion condition, Son of Heaven pushed favor spread virtue benevolence, issued edict saying 'no govern Guangling king', Guangling not changed. Later again convicted of prayers curses exterminated state, suicide, state abolished. Now emperor again established son as Guangling king.
cells.idiomatic: Zhao Cheng. Used discovered Chu state affair, Marquis, two thousand three hundred households. Diji first year, Chu king with Guangling king plotted rebellion, Cheng discovered rebellion condition, Son of Heaven pushed favor spread virtue benevolence, issued edict saying 'no govern Guangling king', Guangling not changed. Later again convicted of prayers curses exterminated state, suicide, state abolished. Now emperor again established son as Guangling king. (translated).

cells.content: 酇
cells.literal: Zuo
cells.idiomatic: Zuo (translated).

cells.content: 地節三年，天子下詔書曰：「朕聞漢之興，相國蕭何功第一，今絕無後，朕甚憐之，其以邑三千戶封蕭何玄孫建世為酇侯」。
cells.literal: Diji third year, Son of Heaven issued edict saying: 'I heard Han's rise, Prime Minister Xiao He merit first, now completely no posterity, I very pity it, therefore with fief three thousand households enfeoff Xiao He great grandson Jian Shi as Zuo Hou'.
cells.idiomatic: Diji third year, Son of Heaven issued edict saying: 'I heard Han's rise, Prime Minister Xiao He merit first, now completely no posterity, I very pity it, therefore with fief three thousand households enfeoff Xiao He great grandson Jian Shi as Zuo Hou'. (translated).

cells.content: 平昌
cells.literal: Ping Chang
cells.idiomatic: Ping Chang (translated).

cells.content: 王長君，家在趙國，常山廣望邑人也。衛太子時，嫁太子家，為太子男史皇孫為配，生子男，絕不聞聲問，行且四十餘歲，至今元康元年中，詔徵，立以為侯，封五千戶。宣帝舅父也。
cells.literal: Wang Chang Jun, family in Zhao state, Changshan Guangwang town person. Crown Prince time, married Crown Prince house, as Crown Prince male secretary Huang Sun match, gave birth to son male, completely not heard sound inquiry, conduct nearly forty remaining years, until now Yuankang first year middle, edict summoned, established as Marquis, enfeoffed five thousand households. Emperor Xuan maternal uncle father.
cells.idiomatic: Wang Chang Jun, family in Zhao state, Changshan Guangwang town person. Crown Prince time, married Crown Prince house, as Crown Prince male secretary Huang Sun match, gave birth to son male, completely not heard sound inquiry, conduct nearly forty remaining years, until now Yuankang first year middle, edict summoned, established as Marquis, enfeoffed five thousand households. Emperor Xuan maternal uncle father. (translated).

cells.content: 樂昌。
cells.literal: Le Chang.
cells.idiomatic: Le Chang. (translated).

cells.content: 王稚君，家在趙國，常山廣望邑人也。以宣帝舅父外家封為侯，邑五千戶。平昌侯王長君弟也。
cells.literal: Wang Zhi Jun, family in Zhao state, Changshan Guangwang town person. With Emperor Xuan maternal uncle father maternal family enfeoffed as Marquis, fief five thousand households. Pingchang Hou Wang Chang Jun younger brother.
cells.idiomatic: Wang Zhi Jun, family in Zhao state, Changshan Guangwang town person. With Emperor Xuan maternal uncle father maternal family enfeoffed as Marquis, fief five thousand households. Pingchang Hou Wang Chang Jun younger brother. (translated).

cells.content: 邛成。
cells.literal: Qiong Cheng.
cells.idiomatic: Qiong Cheng. (translated).

cells.content: 王奉光，家在房陵。以女立為宣帝皇后，故封千五百戶。言奉光初生時，夜見光其上，傳聞者以為當貴云。後果以女故為侯。
cells.literal: Wang Feng Guang, family in Fangling. With daughter established as Emperor Xuan Empress, therefore enfeoffed one thousand five hundred households. Spoke Feng Guang first born time, night saw light above it, transmitters believed should be noble. Later indeed with daughter reason became Marquis.
cells.idiomatic: Wang Feng Guang, family in Fangling. With daughter established as Emperor Xuan Empress, therefore enfeoffed one thousand five hundred households. Spoke Feng Guang first born time, night saw light above it, transmitters believed should be noble. Later indeed with daughter reason became Marquis. (translated).

cells.content: 安遠。
cells.literal: An Yuan.
cells.idiomatic: An Yuan. (translated).

cells.content: 鄭吉，家在會稽。以卒伍起從軍為郎，使護將弛刑士田渠梨。會匈奴單于死，國亂，相攻，日逐王將眾來降漢，先使語吉，吉將吏卒數百人往迎之。眾頗有欲還者，斬殺其渠率，遂與俱入漢。以軍功侯，二千戶。
cells.literal: Zheng Ji, family in Kuaiji. With soldier commoner arose followed army became Palace Attendant, sent protect general released criminal soldiers Tian Quli. Met Xiongnu Chanyu died, state chaotic, mutually attacked, Rizhu king led multitude came surrendered Han, first sent spoke to Ji, Ji led officials soldiers several hundred went welcome. Multitude quite had those wanted return, beheaded killed their leaders, then with altogether entered Han. With military merit Marquis, two thousand households.
cells.idiomatic: Zheng Ji, family in Kuaiji. With soldier commoner arose followed army became Palace Attendant, sent protect general released criminal soldiers Tian Quli. Met Xiongnu Chanyu died, state chaotic, mutually attacked, Rizhu king led multitude came surrendered Han, first sent spoke to Ji, Ji led officials soldiers several hundred went welcome. Multitude quite had those wanted return, beheaded killed their leaders, then with altogether entered Han. With military merit Marquis, two thousand households. (translated).

cells.content: 博陽。
cells.literal: Bo Yang.
cells.idiomatic: Bo Yang. (translated).

cells.content: 邴吉，家在魯。本以治獄為御史屬，給事大將軍幕府。常施舊恩宣帝，遷為御史大夫，封侯，二千戶。神爵二年，代魏相為丞相。立五歲，病死。子翁孟代立，為將軍，侍中。甘露元年，坐祠宗廟不乘大車而騎至廟門，有罪，奪爵，為關內侯。
cells.literal: Bing Ji, family in Lu. Originally with governing prisons gave service became Judicial Official subordinate, gave service Grand General tent headquarters. Constantly bestowed old favor Emperor Xuan, promoted Grand Minister of Justice, enfeoffed Marquis, two thousand households. Shenjue second year, replaced Wei Xiang as Chancellor. Stood five years, died of illness. Son Weng Meng succeeded, became General, Palace Attendant. Ganlu first year, convicted of ancestral temple sacrifice not rode grand carriage but rode to temple gate, committed crime, title stripped, became Guan Nei Hou.

cells.content: 建成。
cells.literal: Jian Cheng.
cells.idiomatic: Jian Cheng. (translated).

cells.content: 黃霸，家在陽夏，以役使徙雲陽。以廉吏為河內守丞，遷為廷尉監，行丞相長史事。坐見知夏侯勝非詔書大不敬罪，久繫獄三歲，從勝學尚書。會赦，以賢良舉為揚州刺史，潁川太守。善化，男女異路，耕者讓畔，賜黃金百斤，秩中二千石。居潁川，入為太子傅，遷御史大夫。五鳳三年，代邴吉為丞相。封千八百戶。
cells.literal: Huang Ba, family in Yangxia, with corvee moved Yunyang. With incorruptible official became Henan governor assistant, promoted Judicial Official supervisor, acted Chancellor long historian affairs. Convicted of seeing knew Xiahou Sheng violated edict great disrespectful crime, long imprisoned three years, followed Sheng studied Shangshu. Met amnesty, with worthy good selected as Yangzhou inspector, Yingchuan grand administrator. Good transformation, male female different paths, plowmen yielded borders, bestowed yellow gold one hundred jin, rank middle two thousand shi. Resided Yingchuan, entered became Crown Prince tutor, promoted Grand Minister of Justice. Wufeng third year, replaced Bing Ji as Chancellor. Enfeoffed one thousand eight hundred households.

(translated).

cells.content: 西平。
cells.literal: Xi Ping.
cells.idiomatic: Xi Ping. (translated).

cells.content: 于定國，家在東海。本以治獄給事為廷尉史，稍遷御史中丞。上書諫昌邑王，遷為光祿大夫，為廷尉。乃師受春秋，變道行化，謀厚愛人。遷為御史大夫，代黃霸為丞相。
cells.literal: Yu Ding Guo, family in Donghai. Originally with governing prisons gave service became Judicial Official historian, gradually promoted Grand Minister of Justice middle captain. Memorialized admonished Changyi king, promoted Guanglu Dafu, became Judicial Official. Then teacher received Spring and Autumn, changed way practiced transformation, planned substantial loved people. Promoted Grand Minister of Justice, replaced Huang Ba as Chancellor.
